comment: Daily value recalculated from valid 5 minute readings due to 20 minutes missing data caused by instrument check.  23 hours of data is required to calculate a valid daily value.  The recalculation changed the daily value from 24.968 to 25.784.
Missing record on 31/08/2022 for 1 day due to 4.42 hours of missing data while Watercare completed instrument audit.
